title: Review: Lightweight Quoc Mono II carbon road shoes dial in fit & understated looks
content:
Quoc’s new light Mono II carbon road shoes signal a new direction for the shoemaker, upgrading their original Night series for improved fit, performance, and durability. We’ve been riding the light & classically simple new shoes since the start of this summer, coming away mostly pleased with the upgraded dial retention, overall fit, and feel.

The post Review: Lightweight Quoc Mono II carbon road shoes dial in fit & understated looks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
